text: Milutin Šoškić (Serbian Cyrillic: Милутин Шошкић; 31 December 1937 – 27 August 2022) was a Serbian professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He made 50 appearances for Yugoslavia national football team between 1959 to 1966. He won an Olympic gold medal in 1960. Šoškić died on 27 August 2022 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Yugoslavian footballers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Yugoslavia
title: Milutin Šoškić
